data.name: chess
data.description:
This chess application uses MIXED REALITY to deliver the most realistic and authentic over-the-board chess playing experience yet. 

Play with FRIENDS or AI
You are able to choose whether you want to play against your friends or against chess-AI's in various difficulties.

Finally HAPTIC feedback
This application was developed with authentic interactions in mind.
After table calibration your UI will be displayed on your real table transforming it to a huge smartscreen.
Additionally our experimental mode lets you play with a real chessboard thereby allowing the real haptic chess-playing experience, where you can feel all of your chess-pieces and move them naturally. 
Controllers are never needed.

Perfectly blending REALITY and VIRTUALITY
This app is located both in reality and virtuality. In MIXED REALITY you are still able to see your real surrounding. It is extended with digital elements such as your playing partner and his chess pieces. Depending on if you are playing with a physical chessboard and physical pieces these assets are either part of your reality or the digital virtuality.

Due to the MIXED REALITY focus we recommend using the application with Quest Pro or Quest 3.
